attributes.action: add a 'Sunset Clause' to any major piece of Legislation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many laws are drawn up in reaction to events or a perceived  requirement. Over time, those events or the requirement cease to be relevant, thus the laws drawn up in response themselves cease to be relevant.
It is therefore suggested that such laws are subject to a 'Sunset Clause' so, if not specifically renewed, expire after a given period. This would ensure that the Statute Book remains relevant
